entry.title: 关于
entry.content:
关于

Dawn,现本科就读于南方一所不怎么知名的211高校，兴趣广泛，主要集中在电力电子、电力系统、自动控制、计算机技术等方面，偶尔也读读文学、人物传记。

这里会记录一些个人总结，以及折腾各种软硬件的过程和感想。

网站才刚刚起步，还有许多需要完善的地方。

about

Hello I'm Dawn Chung,currently study for bachelor's degree in south China. English is not my first language and I apologize for any grammer mistakes. My interest vary from electical engineering to Web techonology. Sometimes also read literature,here literature does not denote paper,and paper doesn't stand for...well...
